name: Madness Inc.
description:
Check out my upcoming game here!

What is this crap about?

Madness Inc. is a boss rush bullet hell game, in which you take role of a worker? in Madness Inc. venture deeper and deeper into this madness called the headquarters of Madness Inc.

Made for Ludum Dare 48

This bad boy was made for LD48 in 48 hours, theme for which was "Deeper and Deeper"
